name: Ball Smash
description:
This is a small game in the style of brick break. 10 levels and a boss at the end! Can you reach the end?
Catch powerup, destroy blocks and collect the maximum number of points.

Control
Space  -  action
Left, right arrow  -  move
A, D  -  move
P  -  Pause
